Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Authorizes certain municipalities to adopt a clothing and footwear sales tax exemption after March first
Summary: Pushes back the date that certain municipalities can adopt a clothing and footwear sales tax exemption from March first to August first.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to authorizing certain municipalities to adopt a clothing and footwear sales tax exemption after March first; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon the expiration thereof
